data.title: 12/01/06 - Luke Ridnour sinks the game winner at the buzzer to beat the Indiana Pacers at home, 105-103! The final play was meant to feed...
data.meta_description:
109 likes, 7 comments - saveoursupersonics on February 4, 2024: "12/01/06 - Luke Ridnour sinks the game winner at the buzzer to beat the Indiana Pacers at home, 105-103!

The final play was meant to feed either Rashard Lewis or Ray Allen, but with both of them fully covered
Ridnour had to take matters into his own hands. 
Little did he know that he was about to make one of the most memorable plays of the season.

As a career 80% free throw shooter, Luke shocked Key Arena by missing 2 free throws just moments prior. But he capitalized on his second chance, hitting the dagger with time expiring over the outstretched arms of Pacers Forward, Danny Granger.
In the words of Granger after the game: ‚ÄúHe made a hell of a shot.‚Äù

Luke finished the contest with 17 points & 6 assists.

‚ÄúThe desire accomplished is sweet to the soul.‚Äù - Proverbs 13:19.

üé•: NBA - ‚ÄúI Love This Game‚Äù feat. Luke Ridnour (tv spot, 2006) 

#Seattle #Supersonics #Sonics #BringEmBack #SaveOurSonics".
